com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics

Class BufferLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.BufferLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<BufferAttribute>

    public class BufferLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<BufferAttribute>
    Keeps structural and size-related information concerning the layout of a VertexBufferObject, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc. .

      • push

        public void push(java.lang.String name,
                 int count,
                 boolean normalized)
        Adds a layout component which is a sequence of floats.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the attribute (e.g. position)
        count - is the length of the sequence
        normalized - is true if the sequence elements are normalized
